import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import '../styles/home.css'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [postText, setPostText] = useState(''); const [posts, setPosts] = useState([ { id: 1, user: { name: 'John Doe', avatar: 'https://via.placeholder.com/40x40' }, content: 'Just finished an amazing project! Can\'t wait to share more details with everyone. #coding #webdev #excited', image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/600x400', time: '2 hours ago', likes: 15, comments: 8 }, { id: 2, user: { name: 'Jane Smith', avatar: 'https://via.placeholder.com/40x40' }, content: 'Beautiful sunset today! Nature never fails to amaze me. ðŸŒ…', time: '5 hours ago', likes: 23, comments: 12 } ]); const handleCreatePost = () => { if (!postText.trim()) return; const newPost = { id: Date.now(), user: { name: `${user?.firstName} ${user?.lastName}`, avatar: `https://via.placeholder.com/40x40/FFD700/000000?text=${user?.firstName?.charAt(0) || 'U'}` }, content: postText, time: 'Just now', likes: 0, comments: 0 }; setPosts([newPost, ...posts]); setPostText(''); }; const handleKeyPress = (e) => { if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) { e.preventDefault(); handleCreatePost(); } }; const openPostModal = (type) => { const typeNames = { 'photo': 'Photo', 'video': 'Video', 'feeling': 'Feeling', 'share': 'Share' }; alert(`${typeNames[type]} post feature coming soon!`); }; const createStory = () => { alert('Story creation feature coming soon!'); }; const openStory = (index) => { const storyNames = ['Your Story', 'John Doe', 'Jane Smith', 'Mike Johnson', 'Sarah Wilson', 'Alex Brown']; const storyName = storyNames[index] || 'Unknown User'; alert(`Opening ${storyName}'s story...`); }; return (
{/* Create Post Section */}
setPostText(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={handleKeyPress} />
{/* Stories Section */}
Your Story
{['John Doe', 'Jane Smith', 'Mike Johnson', 'Sarah Wilson', 'Alex Brown'].map((name, index) => (
openStory(index + 1)}>
{name}
))}
{/* Posts Feed */}
{posts.map((post) => (

{post.user.name}

{post.time}

{post.content}

{post.image && ( )}
))}
{/* Right Sidebar */}
{/* Notices Section */}

Notices

Exam Schedule Updated

Final exam schedule has been updated. Check your portal.

2 hours ago

Annual Sports Day

Annual sports day will be held next month. Register now!

1 day ago

Graduation Ceremony

Graduation ceremony details announced. Check your email.

3 days ago
{/* Department Updates */}

Department Updates

CSE Department

New programming workshop this weekend

4 hours ago

EEE Department

Circuit design competition registration open

1 day ago

ME Department

Robotics workshop next week

2 days ago
); }; export default Home;
